## 激活

jetbrains全家通通用激活方式

- 添加下列参数到安装目录或用户目录下的vmoptions文件
	 - windows: `C:\Users\用户名\AppData\Roaming\JetBrains\对应IDE\xxxx.vmoptions`
	- linux: `/home/用户名/.config/JetBrains/对应IDE/xxxx.vmoptions`
	- macOS: `/Users/用户名/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/对应IDE/xxxx.vmoptions`
```conf
#新版IDE需要添加Java17的支持，否则会报 Key is invalid
-javaagent:/opt/coding/dev-kits/ide/ja-netfilter/ja-netfilter.jar
--add-opens=java.base/jdk.internal.org.objectweb.asm=ALL-UNNAMED
--add-opens=java.base/jdk.internal.org.objectweb.asm.tree=ALL-UNNAMED
```


启动后输入下方的激活码

```sh
MXMQUYT815---

```

## 设置

设置 vmoptions 变量

```properties
-Xms1024m
-XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=1024m
-Xmx1024m
```

设置环境变量

```properties
idea.config.path=${user.home}/.jetbrains/pycharm/config
idea.system.path=${user.home}/.jetbrains/pycharm/system
idea.plugins.path=${idea.config.path}/plugins
idea.log.path=${idea.system.path}/log
```
